text: The following table of contents for the Book of Leinster is based on the diplomatic edition by R.I. Best and M.A. O'Brien. The contents are listed according to the folio number of the manuscript and the page and volume number of the edition. The names of poets assigned in the Book of Leinster are here followed by (ascr.) (for 'ascribed') and need not represent genuine authorship. ==Diplomatic edition vol 1== {| class="wikitable" style="border- collapse:collapse;background:white;" cellpadding=5px +caption |- ! folio (MS) ! page (ed.) ! textPoems without title will be referred to by opening line and put between inverted commas. |- | 1 | 1 | Lebor Gabála |- | 14b 40 | 56 | Do Flathiusaib hÉrend |- | 24a 40 | 94 | Do Flaithesaib hÉrend Iar Creitim (annals) |- | 26b 30 | 100 | Poem "Connachta cid dia tá in t-ainm" |- | 27a | 103 | Cormac mac Cuilennáin (ascr.)
